item.title: 市场都做得很好。忽略风险的刀刃吧
item.description:
"一个糟糕的数字 "有可能破坏美联储即将实施的减产计划

‘One bad number’ threatens to wreck the calculus of Fed cuts coming soon

】

item.title: 津巴布韦与中国商谈 5.33 亿美元改造国家铁路公司
item.description: 津巴布韦正在与中国中铁股份有限公司谈判，以帮助国有的津巴布韦国家铁路实现现代化。【原文：Zimbabwe is in talks with China Railway Group Ltd. to help modernize the state-owned National Railways of Zimbabwe.】

item.title: 鲍比-贾因的新对冲基金计划大举进军大宗商品领域
item.description: 鲍比-贾恩（Bobby Jain）的新对冲基金正在从大宗商品贸易公司挖掘人才，并将募集到的资金中的一大部分投入到原材料领域，包括实物市场。【原文：Bobby Jain’s new hedge fund is tapping talent from commodity trading houses and committing a chunk of the money it’s raising for a major push into raw materials — including in the physical market.】

item.title: 通胀乐观情绪消退，国债连续第三天下滑
item.description: 国债周一连续第三天下跌，削弱了上周美国债券因通胀压力有缓解迹象而出现的涨势。【原文：Treasuries fell for a third day on Monday, paring last week’s rally in US bonds on signs of easing inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 摩根大通称每位新员工都将接受人工智能培训
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）正在对每一位银行业新员工进行人工智能培训，让他们做好准备，迎接这项被首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）比作印刷机和蒸汽机影响的技术。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is immersing every new banking employee in artificial-intelligence training, preparing them for a technology Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon has likened to the impact of the printing press and steam engine.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将启动黄金追踪系统以遏制走私活动
item.description: 津巴布韦唯一授权的黄金买家将引入一套系统，追踪从矿山到市场的金属供应，以阻止走私。【原文：Zimbabwe’s sole authorized buyer of gold will introduce a system that traces supply of the metal from mines to the market in a bid to stop smuggling.】

item.title: 肯尼亚称正与阿美石油公司洽谈浮式液化气船事宜
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）的政府正与沙特阿美公司（Saudi Aramco）谈判，以获得一个浮动液化石油气设施，从而增加供应并降低这个东非国家的燃料价格。【原文：Kenya is in talks with Saudi Aramco to obtain a floating liquefied petroleum gas facility as President William Ruto’s government attempts to boost supply and reduce fuel prices in the East African nation.】

item.title: 杠杆基金助推墨西哥比索重回货币头把交椅
item.description: 杠杆基金是近期墨西哥比索反弹的主要力量，推动墨西哥比索再次成为今年全球表现最好的货币。【原文：Leveraged funds have been the main force behind the recent Mexican peso rally, propelling it to again become the best performing currency in the world this year.】

item.title: 灰度公司迈克尔-桑纳夏卸任加密货币公司首席执行官一职
item.description: Michael Sonnenshein 将辞去加密货币资产管理公司 Grayscale Investments 的首席执行官一职。【原文：Michael Sonnenshein is stepping down as chief executive officer of Grayscale Investments, a cryptocurrency asset manager.】

item.title: 纽约 MTA 考虑用成本更低的债务取代 "建设美国 "债券
item.description: 纽约大都会运输局正在考虑将其 37.3 亿美元的应税 "建设美国债券"（Build America Bonds）中的至少一部分偿还为免税债务，尽管一些投资者对此类交易表示反对。【原文：New York’s Metropolitan Transportation Authority is considering refunding at least a portion of its $3.73 billion of taxable Build America Bonds into tax-exempt debt, even as some investors push back against such transactions.】

item.title: 私募股权投资瞄准 NFL，伊莱-曼宁希望拥有自己的球队
item.description: 退役四分卫伊莱-曼宁（Eli Manning）曾带领处于劣势的纽约巨人队两次夺得超级碗冠军，现在他想拥有一支自己的球队。【原文：Eli Manning, the retired quarterback who led the underdog New York Giants to two Super Bowl victories, now wants a team of his own.】

item.title: 自肯布尔公司违约以来，联合公用事业公司首次发行水务公司债券
item.description: 英国联合公用事业集团公司（United Utilities Group Plc）重返一级债券市场，这是自泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd. ）的所有者拖欠部分债务以来，英国首家公开举债的水务公司。【原文：United Utilities Group Plc is back in the primary bond market, the first UK water company to publicly raise debt since Thames Water Ltd.’s owner defaulted on some of its debt.】

item.title: 象牙海岸在非洲评级记分卡上超越南非
item.description: 世界头号可可生产国象牙海岸已超过南非，成为撒哈拉以南非洲未偿外债评级最高的主权国家。【原文：Ivory Coast, the world’s top cocoa producer, has overtaken South Africa to become the best-rated sovereign in sub-Saharan Africa with foreign debt outstanding.】

item.title: 能源大亨向阿根廷矿产资源下百年赌注
item.description: 三十年来，何塞-路易斯-曼萨诺在阿根廷的不良行业中建立了良好的声誉，并在动荡的经济和政治周期中游刃有余，形成了从媒体到能源的投资组合。【原文：Over three decades, Jose Luis Manzano built a reputation for diving into distressed sectors in Argentina and navigating tumultuous economic and political cycles to shape a portfolio ranging from media to energy.】

item.title: 津巴布韦要求矿商提高黄金产量以支持 ZiG 货币
item.description: 津巴布韦矿业和矿业发展部长温斯顿-奇坦多表示，津巴布韦已要求全国各地的金矿开采商提高产量，以支持上个月推出的 ZiG 货币。【原文：Zimbabwe has asked gold miners across the country to ramp up output to support the ZiG currency launched last month, according to Mines and Mining Development Minister Winston Chitando.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚总理撤销提格雷出生的亚伯拉罕的国防部长职务
item.description: 据埃塞俄比亚国家广播公司 EBC 报道，埃塞俄比亚总理阿比-艾哈迈德对其内阁进行了调整，其中包括免去亚伯拉罕-贝莱的国防部长职务。【原文：Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed has made changes to his cabinet, which included the removal of Abraham Belay as defense minister, the state broadcaster EBC reported.】

item.title: 今日巴西五大热点话题
item.description: 央行在 Copom 会议记录之后发布首份 Focus 调查报告。迪奥戈-吉伦参加经济学家会议。参议院本周可能就逐步削减工资税进行投票。国外市场正在等待美联储成员的声明，纽约收益率和股市期货小幅波动。大宗商品中，铜和黄金创下历史新高，铁矿石因对中国房地产市场措施的乐观情绪而上涨。由于交易商密切关注局势，石油小幅下跌。【原文：Banco Central divulga primeira pesquisa Focus após ata do Copom. Diogo Guillen participa de reuniões com economistas. Senado pode votar na semana a reoneração gradual da folha de pagamentos. No exterior, mercados aguardam falas de integrantes do Fed com yields e futuros das bolsas em NY em oscilações leves. Entre as commodities, cobre e ouro batem recordes e minério de ferro sobe com otimismo sobre medidas chinesas para o mercado imobiliário. Petróleo tem leve baixa com operadores atentos à situ】

item.title: 普京的空想暴露了中国的能源优势
item.description:
俄罗斯总统上周结束了对北京的访问，但没有就《西伯利亚电力2》达成正式协议。【原文：

The Russian president ended his visit to Beijing last week without a formal deal on Power of Siberia 2 — once again.

】

item.title: 波音、空客与沙特阿拉伯合作生产飞机用金属材料
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯说，它正在与顶级飞机制造商波音公司和空中客车公司合作，使其铝和钛获准用于这些公司的飞机，以此推动在沙特国内进行更多的生产。【原文：Saudi Arabia said it’s working with top airplane makers Boeing and Airbus to get its aluminum and titanium approved for use in their planes as part of a push to get more manufacturing done inside the kingdom.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天气干燥加剧作物担忧，小麦上涨
item.description: 由于交易商重新关注世界头号出口国俄罗斯的收成风险，芝加哥小麦市场结束了连续四天的跌势。【原文：Wheat in Chicago snapped four days of losses as traders refocused on risks to the harvest in Russia, the world’s top exporter.】

item.title: 艾斯勒交易员退出，公司降低新兴市场利率押注
item.description: 艾斯勒资本公司（Eisler Capital）是一家规模达 40 亿美元的多策略对冲基金，在交易员亏损并与创始人爱德华-艾斯勒（Edward Eisler）的一位高级副手在方法上产生分歧后，该公司已在很大程度上退出了对新兴市场利率的赌注。【原文：Eisler Capital, the $4 billion multi-strategy hedge fund, has largely pulled back from wagering on emerging-markets interest rates after traders lost money and differed on approach with a top deputy of founder Edward Eisler.】

item.title: 美联储官员就政策和经济发表讲话时的最新消息
item.description: 2019年8月13日星期二，美国华盛顿，马里纳-S-埃克尔斯美联储大楼矗立。特朗普政府今天宣布，将把对许多节日购物清单上的部分中国产品征收10%关税的时间推迟到12月中旬，总统承认征收关税会损害消费者利益。【原文：The Marriner S. Eccles Federal Reserve building stands in Washington, D.C., U.S., on Tuesday, Aug. 13, 2019. The Trump administration announced today it will delay until mid-December the 10% tariff on some Chinese products on many holiday-shopping lists, with the president acknowledging that the levies would have hurt consumers.】

item.title: 乌克兰加强哈尔科夫防线，俄罗斯向恰希夫亚尔附近推进
item.description: 俄罗斯加强了对乌克兰东部的攻击，向顿涅茨克地区具有战略重要性的城市恰希夫亚尔推进，而基辅正匆忙派兵加强哈尔科夫附近东北新战线的防御。【原文：Russia stepped up attacks in the east of Ukraine, advancing toward the strategically-important city of Chasiv Yar in the Donetsk area as Kyiv rushed troops to bolster defenses on the new northeastern front near Kharkiv.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。黄金和铜创下历史新高，华尔街最著名的熊市分析师之一转而看好股市，投资者还要面对更多的通胀数据。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Gold and copper hit record highs, one of Wall Street’s most prominent bears turns positive on stocks, and investors have yet more inflation data to contend with. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 阿联酋阿德诺克公司将购买美国 NextDecade 液化天然气项目的股份
item.description: 阿联酋的主要石油公司将购买 NextDecade 公司位于得克萨斯州的液化天然气项目的股份，并从该工厂获得 20 年的供应。【原文：The UAE’s main oil company will buy a stake in NextDecade Corp.’s liquefied natural gas project in Texas, and also take supply from the plant for 20 years.】

item.title: 研究显示：印度到 2030 年需创造 1.15 亿个就业岗位
item.description: 一项研究显示，随着越来越多的人加入劳动力大军，印度到2030年需要创造1.15亿个就业岗位，这表明这个南亚国家必须促进服务业和制造业的发展，以保持经济扩张。【原文：India needs to create 115 million jobs by 2030 as more people enter the workforce, a study showed, suggesting the South Asian nation has to boost services and manufacturing to keep the economy expanding.】

item.title: 据说 WH Ireland 正在商谈将资本市场部门出售给 Zeus
item.description: 财务顾问公司 WH Ireland Group Plc 正在洽谈将其资本市场部门出售给英国投资银行 Zeus Capital 的事宜，这是陷入困境的英国股票经纪公司之间的最新一次动荡。【原文：Financial adviser WH Ireland Group Plc is in talks to dispose of its capital markets division to British investment bank Zeus Capital, the latest shake-up among struggling UK stockbrokers.】

item.title: 法雷尔称印度将成为澳大利亚贸易的 "大赢家
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长唐-法雷尔（Don Farrell）说，澳大利亚对印度的出口稳步增长，出口范围从鳄梨和鲑鱼到电机和医药产品，他将澳大利亚与这个南亚国家的关系形容为 "巨大的胜利"。【原文：Australian exports to India ranging from avocados and salmon to electric motors and pharmaceutical goods have steadily risen, Trade Minister Don Farrell said, describing his country’s ties with the South Asian nation as a “big win.”】

item.title: 穆迪称印度债券指数的上升不足以提升评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的一位信贷官员表示，印度被纳入一个重要的全球债券指数还不足以将该国从最低的投资级别提升到更高的级别，因为该国需要进行结构性改革来改善其财政指标。【原文：India’s inclusion in a key global bond index will not be enough for Moody’s Ratings to upgrade the country from the lowest investment grade as it needs structural reforms to improve its fiscal metrics, according to a credit officer at the ratings firm.】

item.title: 普拉达首席执行官无意大手笔收购，品牌才是重中之重
item.description: Prada SpA 首席执行官 Andrea Guerra 表示，该意大利时尚品牌希望继续专注于发展自有品牌，因此目前不会进行大规模收购。【原文：Prada SpA isn’t shopping for major acquisitions right now, Chief Executive Officer Andrea Guerra said, as the Italian fashion house wants to stay focused on developing its own brands.】
